content: time for another tutorial i made this lineup of baby monsters for my basic amigurumi class at the knitting nest i think they re a pretty good beginner project because it teaches how to start crochet in the round how to single_crochet how to increase and basic construction and customization of amigurumi also on yarnspirations blog 1 1 http //blog yarnspirations com/guest-blogger-craft-cools-allison-hoffman-monster-plushies/
